welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ronnenberg, Germany! Known for its picturesque scenery and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanover Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hanover Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
